Release Notes:

Bardo Pond is an American psychedelic rock band formed in 1991. The current
members of Bardo Pond are Michael Gibbons, John Gibbons, Isobel Sollenberger,
Clint Takeda, and Ed Farnsworth. Bardo Pond&#039;s drug-inspired music is often
classified as space rock, post-rock, or psychedelic rock. Many Bardo Pond album
titles have been derived from the names of esoteric psychedelic substances.

Allmusic describes Bardo Pond as having "lengthy, deliberate sound explorations
filled with all the hallmarks of modern-day space rock: droning guitars, thick
distortion, feedback, reverb, and washes of white noise." Bardo Pond is a
taper-friendly band that encourages fans to make recordings of their shows.
